III Semester

				Research Methodology 
				Knowledge Management 
				Fundamentals of Information Technology 
				Elective III-Accounting for Decision Making 
				Elective IV-Indirect Taxes 
				Extra disciplinary elective-Business Ethics 
				Corporate Governance and Social Responsibility 
				Soft Skill-III


IV Semester

				Management Information Systems 
				Investment Analysis and Portfolio Theory 
				Merchant Banking and Financial Services Project plus Viva-Voce 
				Elective V-Computerized Accounting 
				Soft Skill-IV
